attributes.additional_details:
Put a stop to cowboy builders who destroy more than just their own buisness, declaring themselves bankrupt, but continuing to work in the trade, ripping unknowing customers off left right & Centre.
Many victims are left out of pocket, and unable to put the damage to their homes right & can't sell these properties, many are young buyers with young young children like I was with the house like a building site & nowhere else to go.
